_json.occupation: I teach computer science at a local college
_json.skills: I write code, I write prose.
_json.aboutMe:
I teach and write. I'm interested in programming and all things code related. I've produced innumerable pages of technical writing including over ten published books. I have lots of little devices of various shapes and sizes, but I most like my PC, my Android Phone, and my Kindle.

I also like reading and writing general fiction and non-fiction. 

When I don't have my eyes on a screen or my nose in a book, you might find me wandering around the streets of our cities or the trails of our backcountry. "It is solved by walking."
